explains: n. 祖父母；祖父或祖母；外祖父母；外祖父或外祖母

sentences.en: Part of its mission would be to promote the risks and realities associated with being a grandparent.
sentences.cn: 它的部分使命将是宣传作为祖父母的风险和现实。

sentences.en: The remaining 22% lived in the home of another family member (such as a grandparent, in-law or sibling), a non-relative, or in group quarters like college dormitories.
sentences.cn: 剩下的22%住在另一个家庭成员家里（如祖父母、姻亲或兄弟姐妹），非亲属成员家里，或是像大学宿舍一样的集体宿舍。

sentences.en: She was my last grandparent and I was her only grandchild.
sentences.cn: 她是我最后一位祖母，我是她唯一的外孙。
